code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'../styles/Header.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const[isRunning,setIsRunning]=useState(false);const runSimulation=async()=>{setIsRunning(true);try{await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/run-simulation');console.log('Simulation started');}catch(error){console.error('Error starting simulation:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"2024 Election Simulation"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:runSimulation,disabled:isRunning,children:isRunning?'Simulation Running...':'Run Simulation'})]});};export default Header;
